entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as saying 'We're one short'.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as lifting Mundungus by the scruff of the neck.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is mentioned as being lifted by Hagrid and dropped down beside Fleur.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as moving along to stand between Fred and George instead of Mundungus.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as standing next to Fleur.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as standing next to Fred and Fleur.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as growling at Mundungus.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as the one that Death Eaters will be aiming to capture.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as saying You-Know-who would want to finish Potter in person.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as the one that Dumbledore said would want to finish Potter in person.

relationships.description: Moody scolds Mundungus for being spineless.
Dumbledore predicted that Death Eaters would want to capture Potter in person.
You-Know-Who wanted to finish Potter in person, as per Dumbledore's prediction.
Moody reassures Mundungus that Death Eaters will be aiming to capture Potter, not kill him.
Hagrid drops down Mundungus beside Fleur.
Fred and George stand next to each other.
